Name: Ironroot Heart
Flavor Text: A dense, red-veined tuber, generally dug from beneath old-growth trees.

Flavor Text: A sickly red root with no smell.

Name: Worry Weed

Flavor Text: A desiccated orange peel, dry and bitter.

Name: Joyless Husk

Name: Brazier Pepper
Flavor Text: An intensely yellow pepper that burns going down.

Flavor Text: Tiny yellow seeds that leave a warm tingle on the tongue.

Flavor Text: A pale, chalky yellow root that tastes of nothing.

Flavor Text: A four-leafed clover of vivid green

Name: Coldleaf
Flavor Text: A pale green leaf that feels cool to the touch.

Flavor Text: A murky blue-gray herb that numbs the tongue.

Flavor Text: A brittle yellow-gray vine.

Name: Hesitant Herb
Flavor Text: Pale yellow-blue leaves that crumble easily.

Flavor Text: Dull yellow-indigo powder.
